org.wlf.filedownloader.file_download.file_saver

类 FileSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wlf.filedownloader.file_download.file_saver.FileSaver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Stoppable, Save

    public class FileSaver
extends Object
implements Save, Stoppable
    file saver
    文件保存器
    作者:
    wlf(Andy)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FileSaver

        public FileSaver(String url,
         String tempFilePath,
         String saveFilePath,
         long fileTotalSize)
        constructor of FileSaver
        参数:
        url - the file url
        tempFilePath - the temp file path
        saveFilePath - the save file path
        fileTotalSize - the file total size

    • 方法详细资料

      • setOnFileSaveListener

        public void setOnFileSaveListener(FileSaver.OnFileSaveListener onFileSaveListener)
        set OnFileSaveListener
        参数:
        onFileSaveListener - OnFileSaveListener

      • saveData

        public void saveData(ContentLengthInputStream inputStream,
            long startPosInTotal)
              throws FileSaver.FileSaveException
        if it throw FileSaveException,that means saving data failed(error occur)
        指定者:
        saveData 在接口中 Save
        参数:
        inputStream - the inputStream data needed to save
        startPosInTotal - the start position of inputStream start to save in total data

        |(0,totalStart)----|(startPosInTotal,inputStream start)--- |(inputStream.length,inputStream end)----|(fileTotalSize,totalEnd)

        抛出:
        FileSaver.FileSaveException

      • stop

        public void stop()
        stop save file
        指定者:
        stop 在接口中 Stoppable

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()
        whether is stopped to save file
        指定者:
        isStopped 在接口中 Stoppable
        返回:
        true means stopped
